```{r}
library(cowplot)
library(ggplot2)
library(magick)
```

![](https://r-charts.com/en/part-whole/voronoi-diagram_files/figure-html/voronoi-diagram-border-color.png){width=50%} ![](https://r-charts.com/en/part-whole/voronoi-diagram_files/figure-html/voronoi-diagram-clip.png){width=50%}

```{r image_graph}

y = "https://r-charts.com/en/part-whole/voronoi-diagram_files/figure-html/voronoi-diagram-clip.png"
download.file(y,'y.jpg', mode = 'wb')

library("jpeg")
photo <- readJPEG("y.jpg",native=TRUE)

library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)
photo_panel <- ggdraw() + draw_image(photo, scale = 0.8)

df <- data.frame(Years=rep(2016:2017, each=4),
                 Quarters=rep(paste0("Q", 1:4), 2),
                 Series1=seq(100, 800, 100))

library(ggplot2)
p1 <- ggplot(df) +
  geom_point(aes(x=Quarters, y=Series1)) + 
  facet_wrap( ~ Years, strip.position="bottom", scales="free_x") + 
  theme(panel.spacing=unit(0, "lines"), 
        strip.background=element_blank(), 
        strip.placement="outside", 
        aspect.ratio=1)  # set aspect ratio

plot_grid(p1, photo_panel, ncol = 2)
```
